tool.name: Clean Impute
tool.command:
cleanImpute.R #if str($fileIn).strip() != "": --fileIn="$fileIn" #end if #if str($IDsFile).strip() != "": --IDsFile="$IDsFile" #end if #if str($mapFile).strip() != "": --mapFile="$mapFile" #end if #if str($thresholdNA).strip() != "": --thresholdNA="$thresholdNA" #end if #if str($thresholdMAF).strip() != "": --thresholdMAF="$thresholdMAF" #end if #if str($outputFile1).strip() != "": --outputFile1="$outputFile1" #end if #if str($outputFile2).strip() != "": --outputFile2="$outputFile2" #end if
2>&1

param.name: fileIn
param.help: A binary file with markers coded as 0, 1, 2, NA.
param.label: [required] File In

param.name: IDsFile
param.help: A text file with the IDs of individuals.
param.label: [required] I Ds File

param.name: thresholdNA
param.help: threshold for missing values, a proportion, e.g. 0.15.
param.label: [required] Threshold N A

param.name: thresholdMAF
param.help: threshold for Minor Allele Frequency, e.g. 0.05.
param.label: [required] Threshold M A F

tool.help:
**Description**
Reads a binary file with GBS information already coded in 0,1,2,NA, remove markers with a given proportion of missing values and imputes the remaining using a naive method using observed allelic frequencies.
